name: Myst Jam Entry
description:
This is a small game i created in roughly a week for the Myst JAM hosted by Sophie Houlden, it is based on exploration and puzzle-solving just like the original Myst game.

The game is currently in a prototype state which means that only a few areas are accessible and only two puzzles work so far.

Controls:

WASD to move

Mouse to interact

E to pick up/inspect

ESC to display Menu

F8/F9 to save/load

Changelog for version 0.14:

  • Fixed bug that prevented the game from loading properly on some platforms
  • minor bugfixes on the savegame system
